tool_description: Extracts technical metadata and properties from multimedia content to inform alternative text generation.

media_url.description: URL or file path to the multimedia content

media_type.description: Type of media: image, video, audio, animation, interactive

error_messages: Invalid media URL: Provide a valid URL or accessible file path to the media file.
Unsupported media type: Use one of [image, video, audio, animation, interactive].
Media access error: Unable to access or read the media file.
Metadata extraction failed: The media file format may not contain readable metadata.
usage: Provide media_url and media_type. The tool returns technical properties and embedded metadata that can inform alternative text creation.

dimensions.description: Width and height for visual content

embedded_description.description: Any existing description or alt text in metadata

creation_date.description: Creation or modification date if available
